Public Function CompareTo (another As Rational) As Integer

Docs.summary: Compare this rational to the specified rational to determine their natural order.
Docs.returns: a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this object is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified rational.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsFinite As Boolean
public: property bool IsFinite { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Indicates whether this rational represents a finite value.
Docs.value: true if this rational is a (positive or negative) infinite value; false if this is a finite number value (or NaN)

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsNaN As Boolean
public: property bool IsNaN { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Indicates whether this rational is a Not-a-Number (NaN) value.
Docs.value: true if this rational is a Not-a-Number (NaN) value; false if this is a (potentially infinite) number value

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsZero As Boolean
